8ba0faed6f24.description: Each chapter is written by a different author. For those who’d like to contribute to this evolving work, please email chad@gigg.com.

paragraphs.text: Those who I think would contribute to this awesome saga are:
paragraphs.name: 39bf

paragraphs.text: Great! Which do you want? Or do you want both?

Hey Nnubia! Thanks for reading! We already have writers for chapters 5, 6, and 7. Would you like to write chapter 8? It’s not for awhile (about 4 weeks). Your deadline would be May 5. Be sure to read the Rules and Guidelines if you accept.
paragraphs.name: 2d1d

36758c55421b.title: Also, I would love to submit short stories as well. How do I do that?

paragraphs.text: Also, I would love to submit short stories as well. How do I do that?
paragraphs.name: f84b

3d75bcc3cc97.title: Hey Chad, I’m interested in contributing to this experiment.

paragraphs.text: Hey Chad, I’m interested in contributing to this experiment. Please add my name to the list of writers or designate a chapter for me to write in the current book: The Afterworld Saga.
I would love to! i’m not sure if I submit it to you,or how do I do that? I really want to be apart of the experience!!
paragraphs.name: e909

6b7e455584d8.title: Once you finish writing it, (when you’re about to add hashtags) you need to click the options thing…

paragraphs.text: Once you finish writing it, (when you’re about to add hashtags) you need to click the options thing (usually represented by 3 dots) next to the publish button. Then click “add to publication” and choose the unending tales. All of this must be done on a computer. You can’t submit to publications from a mobile device as far as I know. Let me know if you have problems with this. Either way, we’ll get it posted.
paragraphs.name: 2a41

c92a3246ad26.title: Bookmarked, reading and percolating :-) Thank you Chad Allen Zollinger! This is great!

paragraphs.text: Bookmarked, reading and percolating :-) Thank you Chad Allen Zollinger! This is great!

paragraphs.text: I was wandering, do I send it to you or do I just submit it as mine on my medium channel? sorry for the questions I just want to do this right

16cac664bb67.title: This looks like a great thing!

paragraphs.text: This looks like a great thing! Not sure how it works though! I would love to contribute too. I have read the first four parts and they are simply amazing.
paragraphs.name: a9e2

740744bec530.title: Sure Joe! Would you be interested in writing chapter 6?

paragraphs.text: Sure Joe! Would you be interested in writing chapter 6? Your deadline would be Friday, April 21. I will remind you once chapter 5 is submitted this weekend. (Make sure you read the rules and guidelines). Sound good?
paragraphs.name: 8c04

paragraphs.text: Thank you so much Chad Allen Zollinger!

912bc524d49c.title: May I have a go at this too Chad Allen Zollinger?

paragraphs.text: May I have a go at this too Chad Allen Zollinger? I’d love to try my hand at this! Thank you in advance! :D
paragraphs.name: d22d

7b60b1747de8.title: Great! Would you like to have a go at next week’s chapter?

paragraphs.text: Great! Would you like to have a go at next week’s chapter? That would be chapter 5 and your deadline would be this next Friday the 14th of April. That would give you 3 days
paragraphs.name: 51d9

paragraphs.text: Done
paragraphs.name: 15c3

99bf2b331af5.title: How about I take both if I’m not being too greedy?

paragraphs.text: How about I take both if I’m not being too greedy?
paragraphs.name: 9aba

paragraphs.text: Sure thing! You can do chapter 7 which will have a deadline of Friday April 28. Be sure to read the rules and guidelines before starting.
paragraphs.name: 9a2e

3e2a1cb8723f.title: Ah thanks for including me :-) Let me soak up the story a little bit to get some ideas going.

paragraphs.text: Ah thanks for including me :-) Let me soak up the story a little bit to get some ideas going. Enjoying what I have read so far a reader
paragraphs.name: 850d

paragraphs.text: Hey topic-aholic! How’s Chapter 5 coming along? We’d like to see the work you’ve done so far if you’ve gotten any done. You can submit a draft by clicking the “…” symbol next to where it says publish and selecting The Unending Tales. We’d like to offer input if at all possible.

8722daa66ac7.title: I have read Chapter 1, 2, 2 and 3 and about to dive into Chapter 4.

paragraphs.text: I have read Chapter 1, 2, 2 and 3 and about to dive into Chapter 4.
paragraphs.name: 378e

paragraphs.text: Awesome story line. I will love to contribute.

content.subtitle: Awesome story line. I will love to contribute.

a991694e3e61.title: Great! Which do you want? Or do you want both?

paragraphs.text: Great! Which do you want? Or do you want both?

7a415979fae7.title: Hi, Chad Allen Zollinger: If I’m correct, you’ve an opening for chapters 9 & 10?

paragraphs.text: Hi, Chad Allen Zollinger: If I’m correct, you’ve an opening for chapters 9 & 10? If so, sign me up, I’d love to contribute to this exceptional story!
paragraphs.name: 87aa

paragraphs.text: Perfect! You’ve got Chapters 9 and 10. Your first deadline will be May 12 (chapter 9) and the second deadline will be May 19 (chapter 10). I’ll remind you the week before each. Be sure to read the Rules and Guidelines. Also, since it’s kinda far off you may be interested in submitting short stories in the meantime. Thanks!
paragraphs.name: f373

51b61164c07a.title: Hey Si! I’ve just added you as a writer.

paragraphs.text: Hey Si! I’ve just added you as a writer. You should be able to submit short stories to the publication now. As for writing a chapter, our next open chapter is Chapter 12 (that’s about 8 weeks away) and your deadline would be June 2 so you have plenty of time to submit short stories before your chapter comes up.
paragraphs.name: d49e

virtuals.subtitle: Make sure you read our Rules and Guidelines before starting out. Thanks for joining us!

content.subtitle: Make sure you read our Rules and Guidelines before starting out. Thanks for joining us!

virtuals.subtitle: For those who wish to contribute to one of our books (The Afterworld Saga is the only one right now), simply comment below if you are…

content.subtitle: For those who wish to contribute to one of our books (The Afterworld Saga is the only one right now), simply comment below if you are…

ba767f35486b.name: Ashley Khue Pham
ba767f35486b.bio: The shittiest bookworm in the world who will make you laugh and cry and think with her stories.

51b57513710.name: S Lynn Knight
51b57513710.bio: I’m just a girl whose dreams were predicted to be nothing more than "pipe dreams” — so tell me, what’s there to lose?

591dd7039716.name: topic-aholic
591dd7039716.bio: Some of my stories will include my own creation others will be news or educational. Always stay tuned !!!

badcb5364158.name: Chad Allen Zollinger
badcb5364158.bio: www.mormon.org - Utah Valley University - Email: chad@gigg.com -Instagram: chadzollinger

22b634124165.name: Joe Rodriguez
22b634124165.bio: Administrative Coordinator. I write on Medium and on my website: http://joearodriguez.com/.

414cfc8408a9.name: Abby O. Akoto
414cfc8408a9.bio: A multifaceted young woman determined to leave her mark on the world either through literature, technology or both. http://www.pinterest.com/iamabbydior

557ad163129.name: C.R. Misty
557ad163129.bio: I write romance novels and blog about writing, designing and the experience that goes with it.
